This is a list of templates used to create interactive graphs from {{w|Our World in Data}}. To make interactive on Commons, go to [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-gadgets]] and click ''Owidslider'' in the "Interface: Other" section. For more details see [[MDWiki:WikiProjectMed:OWID]].

*[https://owidimporter.toolforge.org/ OWID Commons upload tool]
*[https://svgtranslate.toolforge.org/ SVG translate tool]
**[https://copy-svg-langs.toolforge.org/ Moving translations]
*[[:Category:Pages using gadget owidslider]]
